channel.title: Proxmox on Gerundium
channel.description: Recent content in Proxmox on Gerundium

item.title: 3.2 Provisioning the k8s nodes
item.description: State/Version: 20240618 3.2 Provisioning the k8s nodes 🚚 3.2.1 Development cluster 🚧 The Development Cluster is privisioned with 🏷️ansible. Running as bare-metal variant of 🏷️talos on the 🏷️Virtualbox platform. The code for the development cluster is documented here: 🌐 homelab repository on github. 3.2.2 Staging cluster The Staging Cluster runs as a set of virtual machines on a 🏷️Proxmox host. The Terraform source code is also stored currently in a privat github repository and will be published soon in this 🌐 homelab repository on github
